topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54979f566368720c582d0200#post_54979f566368720c582d0200
It's called Jail-House Rock.
It functions sort of like short-term memory loss. One you're affected by her stand you can only retain 3 new pieces of information. Once you learn a fourth piece of information you immediately forget the first. Imagine walking into the kitchen, getting a drink, washing your hands, and then forgetting how you got into the kitchen in the first place.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
